name: Food Hunter
description:
Having a bad day? Anger got the best of you? Boredom got stuck in your head? The conversation you are having doesn't amaze you anymore? Since when have those pretty common life situations been an unmanageable problem? This calming and soothing game would be the perfect entertaining distraction for your mind. There is a lot of fun in being the only happy&peaceful person around...Features:
  • 42 different food&drinks items
  • 3500 achievements for your collection
  • The whole settled world theme
  • Soothing background music
